Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a dice, for the purpose of being used to return a random number in a specified range.
    Version:
    6/6
    Author:
    Darren and Sushane

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dice()
      Default, which creates a dice which generates a value between 1 and 6, to represent a traditional chutes and ladders dice.
      Dice(int min, int max)
      Creates a dice with a custom specified range.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int rollDice()
      Returns a value that is between the dice's range, randomly, to represent rolling the dice irl.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dice

        public Dice()
        Default, which creates a dice which generates a value between 1 and 6, to represent a traditional chutes and ladders dice.

      • Dice

        public Dice(int min,
            int max)
        Creates a dice with a custom specified range.
        Parameters:
        Two - integers, where the first int represents the minimum value and the second represents the maximum value.

    • Method Detail

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice()
        Returns a value that is between the dice's range, randomly, to represent rolling the dice irl.
        Returns:
        A random value, which simulates the roll of a dice.
